resources.string:
Negative Thinking Patterns

Mind Reading: This is where an individual jumps into conclusion about what other people are thinking without no indication that the person feels that way.

Filtering: This is where an individual focuses only on the negative parts of a situation and disregard all things positive.

Personalization: This is where an individual makes every negative thing about them. They believe that it's their fault that the negative thing happen.

Fortune Telling: This is where an individual thinks every negative thing is apart of some cycle and just because a certain incident occurred something else is bound to happen.

Black and White Thinking: This is where an individual sees things only as good or bad and never see any middle ground.
